text: Almost Happy is an Argentinian comedy web television series directed by Hernán Guerschuny, written by Sebastián Wainraich and starring Sebastián Wainraich, Natalie Pérez and Santiago Korovsky. The plot revolves around the radio host Sebestián Wainraich and his personal and professional life. It premiered on Netflix on May 1, 2020. ==Cast== * Sebastián Wainraich * Natalie Pérez * Santiago Korovsky * Hugo Arana * Adriana Aizemberg * Peto Menahem ==Episodes== ==Release== Almost Happy was released on 1 May 2020 on Netflix. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Argentine television series Category:Spanish- language television shows Category:Spanish-language Netflix original programming
title: Almost Happy (TV series)
